definition: formal ceremonial music of each succeeding Chinese dynasty starting with the Zhou/Korean a'ak/Japanese gagaku

sentences.english: Besides the secular music, there are also elegant music in the Inner Jiaofang.
sentences.chinese: 除了俗乐以外，在内教坊中还有雅乐。

sentences.english: The focus of the interpretation of titles will be laid on the excavation and summary of the lyrics.
sentences.chinese: 每篇题解，重在对雅乐歌辞的本意进行挖掘和概括。

sentences.english: Advocate cornered, so heart a horizontal, allow to stay.
sentences.chinese: 雅乐走投无路，于是把心一横，容许留下。

sentences.english: Much of that growth will come from the company’s W and Aloft brands.
sentences.chinese: 喜达屋的W和雅乐轩品牌将是其增长的两个主要动力。

definition: (Confucianism) rites and music (the means of regulating society)
qin and se, two string instruments that play in perfect harmony/marital harmony
to perform music/to play a tune
pre-Tang names of the five notes of the pentatonic scale, corresponding roughly to do, re, mi, sol, la
xiao, a Chinese musical instrument of ancient times, similar to panpipes

ancient classification system for musical instruments, based on the material of which the instrument is made (metal 金, stone 石, clay 土, leather 革, silk 絲|丝, wood 木, gourd 匏, bamboo 竹)/the eight kinds of sound produced by instruments in these categories/music
guzheng or long zither/long zither with 13 to 16 strings, developed from guqin 古琴 during Tang and Song times/Japanese koto
zither or guzheng/large zither with 13 to 25 strings, developed from guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] during Tang and Song times
